short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to cancel free trials so you won't be charged.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trial Reminder 1.0 reminds you to cancel free trials so you won't be charged. Enter your email, date you want to be reminded, and website URL. Sit back, relax and don't worry about accidentally paying subscriptions!
